On Fri, Feb 22, 2002 at 02:25:05PM -0000, Heath, Joseph wrote:
> > >project_root
> > >           |  -- src -- com -- myapp
> > >           |  -- test-- com -- myapp
> It does seem strange at first, but after using it for a couple iterations
> you start to wonder how anyone could do it any other way.. ;0)

It's also very useful if you have different implementations of the
same classes (depending on platform, features, ...).

Cheers,
-Ives
